data.title: RIPv2 & RIPng Introduction
data.excerpt:
ToC

RIP

RIP, as Routing Information Protocol for IPv4 network

Version 1. Std. RFC 1058
Version 2. Std. RFC 4822
Next Generatoin. Std. RFC 2080

data.title: A step by step how to start docker-compose container at boot
data.excerpt:
Post in Medium: https://jason19970210.medium.com/a-step-by-step-how-to-start-docker-compose-container-at-boot-effe9964e57f
Once create a docker container, we might hope the container can start automatically by itself, at the boot and even reboot.

data.title: Raspberry Pi 4 with Multiple UART Interface
data.excerpt:
Post in Medium: https://medium.com/@jason19970210/raspberry-pi-4-with-multiple-uart-interface-4eac75f74d7c
Sometimes we need the lots of components, sensors, modules using the UART interface to communicate with the Raspberry Pi.
Here is a small tutor how to setup.
